modules.description: This module represents logical formulas in DIMACS format, supporting parsing from and printing to standard string representations. It converts DIMACS data into a structured formula type used by a SAT solver, facilitating input/output operations for SAT instances. Use cases include reading benchmark files and preparing input for solver algorithms.

This module implements random value drawing under logical constraints expressed as formulas. It supports sampling variable assignments that satisfy a given formula, with options to control verbosity and output in DIMACS format. Typical use cases include test case generation, constraint solving, and probabilistic analysis of logical expressions.
